data.message:
Lee-Anne Barnes
In this coma of sleep, I just wanted to weep, as I woke to find it untrue. That you wanted it to be just me and you. At first it was all bizz, your guy wanted it all his, and we had to come to a conclusion. We decided it should be, just you and me, on your tour and if your life too. But I awoke with a chill as o knew it wasn't real but how I long for it to come true...for Em I totally love you!!
